name: The 7th Floor
description:
"It's been here a long time. You thought you got away, but it's not over yet."

Overview

You made it out, almost; the lift descends. Then, a chilling thought manifests as you scramble to press STOP: you forgot to shutdown the mechanism. Can you leave it online any longer?... no!! You press 7 and ascend back into the dark building above.

Instructions

Get to the control desk and then get out undetected.

Controls

Use WASD and the mouse to direct your search. Follow your instincts, run with SHIFT.

Development

Made by Ruffhaus (ruffhaus, ruffup & labdoc) for:

  • 2020 Epic MegaJam
  • 7DFPS 2020

Per the jam rules & license requirements, asset credits can be found here: Asset Credits
